fitnessPrograms.title: üî• Newbie Fitness Starter Camp
fitnessPrograms.subtitle: Beginner Fitness Training Camp

description.overview: A 5-day beginner-friendly training camp designed for fitness newcomers. Start from zero and systematically learn proper exercise techniques and training methods. Through progressive training plans, help beginners establish good exercise habits, avoid sports injuries, and start a healthy lifestyle journey.
highlights: Professional one-on-one coaching to correct movements
Nutrition and diet guidance, comprehensive health management
Small class size with personalized attention

curriculum.title: Basic Fitness Assessment & Introduction
content: Body composition analysis (body fat percentage, muscle mass, etc.)
Basic movement instruction: squats, push-ups, planks
Cardio introduction: walking and running techniques

curriculum.title: Strength Training Basics
content: Core strength training: crunches, Russian twists

instructor.name: Coach Li
instructor.title: Senior Fitness Coach
instructor.description: Specializes in helping fitness beginners establish correct exercise habits, expert in personalized training program development.

suitableFor: Complete beginners with no fitness experience
People who want to systematically learn fitness knowledge
Those who want to establish healthy lifestyle habits
Beginners who want to avoid sports injuries

fitnessPrograms.title: Fitness Expert Development Journey
fitnessPrograms.subtitle: Advanced Fitness Training Program

description.overview: An advanced training camp for those with existing fitness experience. Through 5 days of intensive training, systematically improve strength, endurance, explosiveness, and overall fitness. Uses advanced training methods to help fitness enthusiasts break through plateaus and reach higher training levels.
highlights: Advanced training methods to break through plateaus

curriculum.title: Fitness Assessment & Training Plan Development
content: Comprehensive fitness testing (strength, endurance, flexibility, explosiveness)

curriculum.title: High-Intensity Strength Training
content: Advanced compound movements: deadlifts, squats, bench press
Explosive training: box jumps, medicine ball throws

instructor.name: Coach Chen
instructor.title: Senior Fitness Coach
instructor.description: Specializes in helping fitness enthusiasts break through training bottlenecks and improve sports performance, with extensive competitive sports training experience.

suitableFor: People with 6+ months of fitness experience
Fitness enthusiasts who want to break through training plateaus
Those who want to improve sports performance
Athletes preparing for fitness competitions
prerequisites: At least 6 months of regular training experience
Ability to perform basic movements like standard squats and push-ups

fitnessPrograms.title: Weekend Vitality Fitness Session
fitnessPrograms.subtitle: Weekend Fitness Course

description.overview: A weekend fitness course designed specifically for working professionals. Use weekend time for efficient training, release work stress from the week, and boost physical vitality. Flexible schedule, perfect for busy urbanites.

instructor.name: Coach Wang
instructor.title: Fitness Coach
instructor.description: Specializes in helping working professionals release stress through exercise and improve quality of life, with extensive group training experience.

suitableFor: Busy working professionals
People who want to exercise on weekends
Those who want to release work stress
Urbanites who want to maintain vitality

fitnessPrograms.title: üßò Yoga & Meditation Wellness Program
fitnessPrograms.subtitle: Mind-Body Balance Training

description.overview: A comprehensive yoga and meditation program designed to improve flexibility, reduce stress, and enhance mental well-being. Through systematic yoga postures, breathing techniques, and meditation practices, help participants achieve physical and mental balance, improve body posture, and cultivate inner peace.
highlights: Professional yoga instruction for all levels

curriculum.title: Foundation & Basic Postures
content: Introduction to yoga philosophy and principles
Basic yoga postures: mountain pose, downward dog, warrior poses

instructor.name: Coach Lin
instructor.title: Senior Yoga Instructor
instructor.description: Dedicated to helping people find balance and peace through yoga and meditation, with extensive experience in restorative yoga and stress management.

suitableFor: People seeking stress relief and relaxation
Those wanting to improve flexibility and posture
Beginners interested in yoga and meditation
Anyone looking for mind-body wellness

fitnessPrograms.title: üí™ Fat Loss & Body Shaping Bootcamp
fitnessPrograms.subtitle: Intensive Weight Loss Training

description.overview: An intensive 6-week fat loss and body shaping bootcamp designed for those who want to lose weight and sculpt their body. Through high-intensity training, metabolic conditioning, and nutritional guidance, help participants achieve significant weight loss and body transformation goals.

curriculum.title: Assessment & Foundation Building
content: Body composition analysis and goal setting

instructor.name: Coach Zhang
instructor.title: Senior Bootcamp Trainer
instructor.specialty: Fat loss, metabolic training, body transformation
instructor.description: Expert in fat loss and body transformation, helping hundreds of participants achieve their weight loss goals through proven training methods.

suitableFor: People wanting to lose weight and burn fat
Those seeking body transformation
Individuals ready for intensive training
Anyone committed to lifestyle change

fitnessPrograms.title: üèÉ Youth Athletic Development Program
fitnessPrograms.subtitle: Teen Fitness & Sports Training

description.overview: A specialized fitness program designed for teenagers aged 13-18. Focus on developing fundamental movement skills, improving athletic performance, building healthy exercise habits, and promoting physical and mental growth. Safe, age-appropriate training methods support healthy development.

instructor.name: Coach Liu
instructor.title: Youth Fitness Specialist
instructor.description: Passionate about youth development, specializing in safe and effective training methods for teenagers to build athleticism and healthy habits.

suitableFor: Teenagers aged 13-18
Youth interested in sports and fitness
Students wanting to improve athletic performance
Teens seeking healthy lifestyle habits

fitnessPrograms.title: ü§± Postpartum Recovery & Fitness
fitnessPrograms.subtitle: Postnatal Exercise Program

description.overview: A specialized fitness program designed for new mothers to safely recover and regain strength after childbirth. Through gentle, progressive exercises, help restore core strength, improve posture, and rebuild fitness while considering the unique needs of postpartum bodies.

instructor.name: Coach Yang
instructor.title: Postnatal Fitness Specialist
instructor.specialty: Postpartum recovery, women's health, core restoration
instructor.description: Specialized in helping new mothers safely recover and regain strength after childbirth, with extensive knowledge in postpartum recovery and women's health.

suitableFor: New mothers 6+ weeks postpartum
Women recovering from childbirth
Mothers wanting to regain fitness
Those seeking postpartum support

fitnessPrograms.title: üåø Senior Health & Mobility Program
fitnessPrograms.subtitle: Gentle Exercise for Active Aging

description.overview: A gentle, safe fitness program designed specifically for seniors aged 60 and above. Focus on maintaining mobility, improving balance, strengthening muscles, and enhancing overall health. Low-impact exercises help prevent falls, maintain independence, and promote active aging.

instructor.name: Coach Wu
instructor.title: Senior Fitness Specialist
instructor.specialty: Senior fitness, fall prevention, active aging
instructor.description: Dedicated to helping seniors maintain independence and vitality through safe, effective exercise programs tailored to their unique needs.

suitableFor: Adults aged 60 and above
Seniors wanting to maintain mobility
Those seeking fall prevention
Anyone wanting active aging support
prerequisites: Ability to stand and move independently
